meanings.definition: Much larger in size or scale than usual.
meanings.sent1: The superscale building towered over the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in a superscale project to expand its operations.
meanings.sent3: The superscale cake was so big, it could feed the entire neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: Her superscale ambitions reached for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The superscale mountain cast a shadow over the valley.

meanings.definition: To increase the size or scale of something.
meanings.sent1: They decided to superscale the production to meet the high demand.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to superscale their services to reach more customers.
meanings.sent3: He tried to superscale his sandwich by adding extra layers of cheese.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to superscale the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The music superscaled the emotions of the audience.

meanings.sent1: The superscale of the project required careful planning.
meanings.sent2: The map displayed the superscale of the city, highlighting key landmarks.
meanings.sent3: The superscale of the event made it a must-attend for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The superscale of her dreams inspired those around her.
meanings.sent5: The superscale of the problem demanded immediate attention.
